sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak condemns Beijing amid allegations a BBC journalist was beaten by police in Shanghai.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Kiev calls for more defensive weapons as foreign affairs ministers from Nordic and Baltic countries held talks in Ukraine's capital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: With temperatures falling, the UN says it's concerned over the millions in Ukraine who are still without electricity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said that China poses a systemic challenge to UK values and interests

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: during his first major speech on foreign policy as leader.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The government condemned Beijing after a BBC journalist claimed he was beaten by police while covering protests in Shanghai.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Instead of listening to their people's protests, the Chinese government has chosen to crack down further, including by assaulting a BBC journalist. The media and our parliamentarians must be able to highlight these issues without sanction, including calling out abuses in Xinjiang and the curtailment of freedom in Hong Kong. China's Foreign Ministry insists the man in question, Ed Lawrence, had failed to identify himself as a journalist.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, a heavy police presence in Shanghai appeared to prevent planned protests on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It follows nationwide demonstrations against strict Covid-19 measures after a deadly fire in a residential block last week during lockdown.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I'm going to be there. Improved air defenses and transformers are needed to keep Russia from attacking Ukraine's

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: energy infrastructure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: That's what the Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmytro Kaleba told seven foreign affairs ministers from Nordic and Baltic countries who visited Kyiv on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky said the visit demonstrated the support and solidarity of Ukraine's allies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Officials discussed the supply of weapons, the energy crisis and efforts to set up a special tribunal to investigate crimes of aggression.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: With temperatures dropping, Norway's minister says Russia is using the weather against the Ukrainian people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Putin has no progress on the battlefield, so he's now using the cold as a weapon and will take away the supply of electricity from ordinary Ukrainians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Ukraine's first lady was in London to attend a conference on preventing sexual violence in conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: While there, Elena Zelenska met with the wife of UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak at Downing Street.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, NATO Secretary-General Jens Stoltenberg met with Romania's president ahead of a two-day session with foreign ministers on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Stoltenberg highlighted the importance of investing in defence and in ways of stepping up support for Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: With hundreds of people fleeing Kherson in Ukraine, the United Nations is concerned about

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: the plight of those civilians remaining as winter sets in.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Millions are still without electricity as Russia continues to bombard the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The UN spokesman said that while repairs to the water and electrical systems have started, it's still very challenging for residents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The situation, however, is still critical and the city continues to receive people fleeing Kherson in recent days, which has been a trend since the start of the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: According to the head of Ukraine's national nuclear energy generating company, Ernergatom, there were signs Russian troops might be leaving the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, Russia denies any withdrawal in southern Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russian presidential spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that one shouldn't look for any signs when there are none and there can't be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, residents in Kyiv have electricity for four hours a day, with temporary heating points installed by local authorities for a hot meal and to recharge phones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And people living in the besieged city of Bakhmut without heat, power, fuel or water are receiving wood-burning stoves.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Around 60 people were rescued after Somali forces stormed a hotel in Mogadishu, where Islamic extremists had been holed up for more than 18 hours. All six extremists and one member of the security forces died during the operation. At least eight civilians were killed and dozens had been trapped since Sunday's attack on the hotel, which is popular among government and security officials. The militant group al-Shabaab claim responsibility for the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The world's largest volcanic volcano has burst into life for the first time in 40 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Mauna Loa in Hawaii has started spewing lava and hot ash.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: According to the United States Geological Survey, the eruption could be seen from 72 kilometers away. There are concerns that winds will carry gases and fine ash, as well as what's called Pele's hair. These are fine strands of volcanic glass formed when lava skeins cool quickly in the air and can be very sharp, posing a danger to skin and eyes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A coal-fired power station in eastern France which closed in March has begun producing electricity again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The Saint-Avold plant in Moselle was one of the last coal-fired facilities in the country and was due to permanently close at the end of last winter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: However the government has extended its activity because of the ongoing energy crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Around 70 workers are needed for the station to operate, and bosses are calling on retirees to go back to work rather than recruit new staff.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A man carrying a rainbow flag has ran onto the pitch in Doha, disrupting a World Cup match between Portugal and Uruguay on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The man was wearing a T-shirt supporting Iranian women and Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Security officials chased the protester and then escorted him off the field.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Qatar's hosting of the World Cup has been marred by controversy, particularly over the country's treatment of migrant workers and the LGBTQ plus community.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The Port of London Authority has stopped issuing new permits for mudlarking along the River Thames.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The hobby involves searching for historical artefacts washed up along the banks of London's famous waterway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But now authorities say the hobby has become too popular.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We've gone from about 200 foreshore permits issued four or five years ago to 5,000 now, and that's a vast increase.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And what we're doing is protecting the integrity and the archaeology of the foreshore.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Centuries ago, Londoners would have been scavenging for something to sell.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Nowadays, it's more of a treasure hunt into the past.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And it's not just locals who are lured in by the loot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I'm always curious about, you know, where you came from and how your ancestors lived and what was their life like and what kind of things did they use.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Michelle had hoped to come to London from Canada to join her fellow foragers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But now she'll have to wait to fulfil her mudlarking dream.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: From Iceland to Portugal and Romania, the second edition of the European Film Month has kicked off after a stunning debut in Berlin.

sentences.sentence: Here in Athens, the Trianon Movie Theatre is one of the Greek capital's best-known art house cinemas. Εδώ στην Αθήνα, το Τριένεν Μουβί Θέατρο είναι ένας των καπιτών της Ελλάδας των πιο γνωστών αρχαίων κίνητρων.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Έχουμε οργανωθεί σκρινινγκ με Q&A, με τους διευθυντές που έπρεπε να βγουν εδώ στο πλαίσιο του Ευρωπαϊκού Φιλμ.

sentences.sentence: And for the screens at home, the streaming service movie has a special line-up of European films, including the French drama Le Venomaux, so the whole world can take part.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It will end on the 10th of December with the European Film Awards in Reykjavik, Iceland, which recognize the best of European cinema.
